It's just a mouth swab and a few fingerprints. Okay?

translation.en: Stand right here on the white X.
Face the screen.
Do your left hand first.
So, young lady...
you seriously did...
or allegedly did all this stuff in those house shoes right there?

‎cáo buộc việc mình làm
‎trong đôi giày kia.

No?

Got up to, like, 130.

Someone can bail you out.
Otherwise, you're gonna see a judge on Tuesday.

translation.en: Questions, comments, concerns?
All right.

Head all the way down to your left.
You can use the phone in there.
You can call any of the bail bondsman's numbers or any of your family members or friends.

translation.en: Nobody in their right mind wants to be sitting

translation.en: in a cell like this, caged up.

translation.en: [female officer] At the Sacramento County Main Jail,
there are over 2,400 male and female inmates.
translation.vi: ‎Có hơn 2.400 nam và nữ tù nhân.

translation.en: Jail is like a small town, but not like a normal small town.

‎Nhà tù như một thị trấn nhỏ,
‎nhưng không như bình thường.

translation.en: You gotta pick up on a whole new set of rules.
translation.vi: ‎Bạn phải tiếp nhận một bộ quy tắc mới.

translation.en: Everyone is in everybody's business
because our lives are really right on top of each other.
translation.vi:
‎Vì cuộc sống của ta
‎ở ngay trên đầu nhau.

translation.en: There's no privacy in jail. We're women, we get periods.

‎Không có riêng tư trong tù.
‎Là phụ nữ, chúng ta có kỳ

‎Tất cả phải tập làm quen với việc
‎dùng chung nhà vệ sinh.

translation.vi:
‎Và chuyện tình cảm, tệ hơn nhiều
‎khi ở đây.

translation.en: One day, the one girl is dating one girl

translation.en: It's like a cluster fuck.
You gotta know who's around you,
you gotta know who you can trust. You gotta know all your enemies.

translation.en: [guard] Back it up.
Go to your cells now!
[inmate] But when you find a good friend in here

I'm not gonna let this place eat me up or make me miserable.

‎nhưng tinh thần và cảm xúc thì không.
‎Tôi tự do.

translation.en: -I'm rollin'! -I'm rollin'!

and they're only housed on the 7th floor.
-[door knocks] -What's going on?
[inmate] Let me out!
I need you to calm down

No.

Crazy.

It was kinda funny, 'cause we were watching--

And I was with my ex girlfriend.

‎Bọn tôi đang xem

And I kinda just hinted around like, "We should rob these girls behind us."

And I'll never forget,

Oh, no. I'm good.
-I don't like it. -But in a good way.

Oh.

‎Nửa người của tôi là hình
‎xăm. ‎QUÁI VẬT

translation.en: Girl, you know you want this dick.

translation.en: I'm from the east coast.
So, I grew up over there.
I was living in New York. I was happy.
translation.vi:
‎Lúc đó tôi ở New York.
‎Tôi hạnh phúc.

translation.en: I had my own place. I was running a business on 5th Avenue.
translation.vi: ‎Tôi có chỗ ở, kinh doanh trên đại lộ 5.

translation.en: I was doing tattoo conventions.
Then side money would be, like, hustling and selling drugs.
translation.vi: ‎Tiền phụ thu nhiều như buôn ma túy.

translation.en: I got locked up on the east coast. I did three months over there,
translation.vi: ‎Tôi bị nhốt ở bờ đông. Làm ba tháng ở đó,

translation.en: then once I got released, I came over here,
translation.vi: ‎rồi khi được thả, tôi đến đây.

translation.en: and I've been mainly in the streets, just hustling and doing that whole thing.
translation.vi:
‎Tôi chủ yếu ở trên đường,
‎hối hả làm chuyện đó.

translation.en: My charges originally were possession of a stolen vehicle, GTA,
translation.vi:
‎Tội của tôi ban đầu là sở hữu xe trộm cắp,
‎GTA,

translation.en: transportation of narcotics,
13 pounds of weed, 65 grams of meth,
translation.vi: ‎mười ba pao cần sa, 65 gam đá,

translation.vi:
‎giả ngân phiếu, phạm trọng tội

getting locked up to, like, look at my life
and be like, "Okay, you're fucking up, you're fucking up.
What are you doing that got you in here?

Hi, I need to bail myself out.
